HCUP Summary Statistics Report: CO SID 2002 - COREFrequency Distribution for DRG18
DRG18
1: CRANIOTOMY AGE >17 EXCEPT FOR TRAUMA
2: CRANIOTOMY FOR TRAUMA AGE >17
3: CRANIOTOMY AGE 0-17
4: SPINAL PROCEDURES
5: EXTRACRANIAL VASCULAR PROCEDURES
6: CARPAL TUNNEL RELEASE
7: PERIPH & CRANIAL NERVE & OTHER NERV SYST PROC W CC
